title: just left a game.....
body:
Because im going against a premade group as a solo queue player. Why would i want to spend 30 minutes getting counter jungled to hell because im not a premade?

Its fucking stupid.

replies.body:
Why would the other four people want to waste 20 minutes loosing a game (and LP?) because you are trash and quit a game instead of making an effort?

Get banned, stay banned.

Premades don't always work out. All you accomplished is giving your opponents the satisfaction of knowing they made you rage, your allies the frustration of a lopsided match, and, probably in all likelihood, multiple and justified reports against you.

i just played with a pre made team vs a premade team i was the random... me and the adc completely wrecked their team... he played well and so did i , we werent premade and we made it work.. he went 16-1-9 and i was 1-2-19 as support and my team won 41 to 15 in kills so not all premades are bad.
